bug.summary: Cannot inference with a single audio file
bug.description:
Hi all, I got a problem with the function "do_single_file_inference" after running the program as follow:
Training: I trained with 1000 epoches and the result was:
<denchmark-code>I Test of Epoch 1000 - WER: 0.003585, loss: 0.11275059029160085, mean edit distance: 0.001187 </denchmark-code>
Using inferencing function: I changed the mode of program from train and test to one_shot_infer as follow:
<denchmark-code>tf.app.flags.DEFINE_boolean ('train', False, 'whether to train the network') tf.app.flags.DEFINE_boolean ('test', False, 'whether to test the network') tf.app.flags.DEFINE_string ('one_shot_infer', './vivos/train/waves/VIVOSDEV01/VIVOSDEV01_R002.wav', 'one-shot ...') </denchmark-code>
then I run DeepSpeech again
Error:
<denchmark-code>Traceback (most recent call last): File "DeepSpeech.py", line 1977, in <module> tf.app.run(main) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/tensorflow/python/platform/app.py", line 125, in run _sys.exit(main(argv)) File "DeepSpeech.py", line 1969, in main do_single_file_inference(FLAGS.one_shot_infer) File "DeepSpeech.py", line 1913, in do_single_file_inference inputs['input_lengths']: [len(chunk)], File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/tensorflow/python/client/session.py", line 887, in run run_metadata_ptr) File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/tensorflow/python/client/session.py", line 1086, in _run str(subfeed_t.get_shape()))) ValueError: Cannot feed value of shape (1, 16, 26) for Tensor 'input_node:0', which has shape '(1, 16, 19, 26)' </denchmark-code>
I ran the program in Ubuntu 16.04, tensorflow-gpu 1.11, GTX 1080 Ti The file I used for inferencing was one of my training files. When training, there was no problem but it was an error in inferencing. I do not know what happen. Help me, please!
